span.b: We are currently working on our Distance Learning Plan for our district.Â We will send out text via school notification system, and update here with new information. 8th-12thÂ grade students check your emails and google classroom for your assingments.Â Stay safe and Thank You for your faith in our staff.

div.p:
Good Afternoon,
The State Board of Education and Superintendent Hofmeister approved the mandatory closure of all accredited public schools in Oklahoma.Â This closure includes all academic instruction, extracurricular activities, and professional development.
This is a difficult decision, but as in all cases the safety of our students, employees, and community is the number one priority. Â This closure will include all school athletic practices, games, school activities, and events. I apologize for the inconvenience this causes and the loss of games, events, and extracurricular activities our students have worked so hard to prepare for.
We will continue to provide you additional information and resources as they become available to us.Â Enjoy your Break and stay safe!
Thanks
Mr. EdwardsÂ Â
